commands.message: '<c> playlist() > music. || discord() > discord link || github() > github link || parrot() > why I use parrot || sub() > subscribe link || commands() > command list  || quote(number) > say quote || quoteadd(number, quote) > adds quote (sub only) :D </c>'

github.message: Check out DOWRIGHT's GitHub here: https://github.com/DOWRIGHTTV

hakcbot.message: Hakcbot is the bot that is currently auto modding DOWRIGHT's channel. Check it out here: https://github.com/DOWRIGHTTV/Hakcbot

dnx.message: DNX is a NextGen Firewall for the consumer and small business market. Check it out here: https://github.com/DOWRIGHTTV/DNX-FWALL-CMD

parrot.message: I prefer Parrot OS because it comes with all Airgeddon options, its preloaded with OpenVAS setup scripts(Vuln Scan), and the general user experience is great. https://www.parrotsec.org/

demo.message: See a technical demo of DNX here: https://youtu.be/6NvRXlNjpOc
